name: Clear
headline: The social commerce app for skincare.
description:
Clear is the free mobile app that helps you track and share your skincare routine. 

We are fuelling innovation and empowering consumers in the skincare industry via data, technology and community. We were also the 2022 L'Or√©al Beauty Tech for Good winners, and were featured under "Best New Apps and Updates" on the App Store in 2023.

The skincare industry is worth $200B and social commerce is going to drive the future growth of every brand in the industry. We're going to be fuelling that growth.

founders.name: Ahana Banerjee, Founder
founders.description: Skincare enthusiast and Imperial College London Physics grad

![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/test-card.png)
![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/stars.png)
Clear is a breath of fresh air! Using Clear, I have got into the routine of using products consistently and seeing genuine results. It has been great to see what other people are using and rating - highly recommend! 
[ ![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/test-danikawoods.jpg) @danikawoods Sensitive  Eczema  ](https://getclearapp.com/<https:/getclearapp.com/user/33187779847685177484>)
![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/test-card.png)
![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/stars.png)
This is such a fantastic app. I love the community feature of this app - a very safe, welcoming and non toxic environment. The routine tracking feature also really helps me to stay consistent with my skincare routine! 
[ ![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/test-yogawithseema.jpg) @yogawithseema Normal  Hyperpigmentation  ](https://getclearapp.com/<https:/getclearapp.com/user/30893755152583620805>)
![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/test-card.png)
![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/stars.png)
Before I tried Clear I never thought that having a daily record of my skincare routine was necessary until I started using my diary. I‚Äôm hoping to write an honest review about every single product I‚Äôve used! 
[ ![](https://getclearapp.com/img/testimonials/test-dessi_daborn.jpg) @dessi_daborn Dry  Anti-aging  ](https://getclearapp.com/<https:/getclearapp.com/user/33881508473878698604>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Clear**

---

**What Clear Is About:**

Clear positions itself at the exciting intersection of social commerce and skincare. Launched in 2021 during Y Combinator's Batch W21, this innovative mobile app provides users with a platform to track, share, and refine their skincare routines. More than just an app, Clear is becoming a vibrant community where skincare enthusiasts can empower each other through shared experiences, insights, and product recommendations.

**Mission:**

Clear‚Äôs mission is to simplify the skincare journey for consumers through data and technology while fostering a supportive community. This fusion of social interactions with skincare routines stands poised to drive future growth in an industry projected to be worth a staggering $200 billion.

**Achievements:**

In just a couple of years, Clear has made significant strides:
- Winner of the 2022 L'Or√©al Beauty Tech for Good award.
- Featured as one of the "Best New Apps and Updates" on the App Store in 2023.

**Current Focus:**

Clear is dedicated to helping users discover their skin types, tracking their routine, and connecting them with others who share similar skincare journeys. The app has received solid ratings‚Äî4.9 stars on both the App Store and Google Play‚Äîthanks to its user-centric design and community features.

**Team & Location:**

Based in London, UK, Clear operates with a small team of just 2 employees. Their lean size allows for agile decision-making and close-knit collaboration. They are currently partnered with nan as their Group Partner.

**Key Tags:** Marketplace, Consumer, Digital Health, Data Engineering.

**Why People Love Clear:**

Users rave about Clear‚Äôs intuitive tracking of their skincare routines and the sense of community it fosters. They appreciate the non-toxic environment and the valuable product insights shared among users, ultimately leading to real results in their skincare journeys.

---

To get started on your skincare journey or join the community, check out their website [here](https://getclearapp.com).
